helpText.color: Overwrite the font color of the entire content of the section with this setting.
helpText.backgroundColor: Set a background color based on given tamplate variables. Gradients are also possible.
helpText.fixedBackground: If you have assigned a background image to the section, this effect works great!
helpText.offsetTop: With this setting you set a negative offset. The elements of the section shift by the number of pixels above the overlying section.
helpText.offsetBottom: With this setting you set a negative offset. The elements of the section shift by the number of pixels above the underneath section.
helpText.top: With this setting you can create a pseudo element above the section that represents a transition between sections. (For example, a 'wave' or a 'jagged edge')
helpText.bottom: With this setting you can create a pseudo element under the section, which represents a transition between sections. (For example, a 'wave' or a 'jagged edge')
helpText.separatorBackground: Set a background color for the pseudo element.
